en.vbucks.embed.title: V-Bucks
en.vbucks.slash.name: vbucks
en.vbucks.slash.description: View your V-Bucks and X-Ray Tickets balance (authentication required)
en.vbucks.meta.description: This command displays your total V-Bucks, provide a breakdown on the source(s) of those V-Bucks, and additionally display how many X-Ray tickets you have. You must be authenticated to use this command.
en.reward.embed.title: Reward
en.reward.embed.field2.founder: **{0} Next V-Bucks & X-Ray Tickets reward in: **
en.reward.slash.name: reward
en.reward.slash.description: View info about a specific day's reward, and the rewards that follow
en.reward.meta.description: This command lets you view the rewards of any specific day, and any number of rewards that follow.
en.reward.meta.args.day.description: The day to get the rewards of. Not required if you are authenticated
en.reward.meta.args.limit.description: The number of upcoming days to see
en.reward.error.noday2: You need to specify a day to get the reward for
en.reward.error.invalidday2: The given day must be a number
en.reward.error.invalidlimit2: The limit must be a number
en.reward.error.general2: Please let us know on the support server :D
en.research.embed.title: Research
en.research.embed.insufficient: *You do not have enough points to level up **{0}***
en.research.slash.name: research
en.research.slash.description: Claim and spend your research points (authentication required)
en.research.meta.description: This command lets you claim your available research points, view your FORT research levels, and upgrade those levels. Press the button corresponding with the stat you want to upgrade.
en.research.error.zeroplaceholder: You currently have **0** research points available.
en.profiledumper.embed.title: Profile Dump
en.profiledumper.slash.name: profiledumper
en.profiledumper.embed.processing.title: Dumping profiles
en.profiledumper.meta.brief: Dumps your Fortnite profiles as JSON attachments (authentication required)
en.profiledumper.meta.description: This command dumps all your Fortnite profiles (14 total) as JSON attachments. You must be authenticated to use this command.
en.power.slash.name: power
en.power.meta.description: This command allows you to view the power level of your STW homebase. You must be authenticated to use this command for now.
en.power.embed.title: Power Level
en.news.slash.name: news
en.news.slash.description: View the latest in-game news from Fortnite
en.news.slash.mode.description: Choose a game mode to see news from
en.news.embed.processing.title: Fetching the latest news
en.news.meta.args.mode.description: The game mode to see news from (stw/br)
en.news.meta.description: This command will fetch and display the latest news from the game. You can switch between viewing Save the World or Battle Royale news by pressing the corresponding buttons. Cycle between pages by pressing the left/right arrow buttons.
en.llamas.embed.title: Store
en.llamas.view.option.return.name: Return
en.llamas.confirmation.description: **Are you sure you want to purchase {0} {1} for {2} {3}?**
en.llamas.slash.name: llamas
en.llamas.meta.brief: View and purchase Llamas in the Llama shop
en.llamas.meta.description: This command allows you to view the available Llamas in the Llama shop, the contents of the available llamas purchase them. As this information is specific to your account, you will need an active session or to provide your authcode.
en.invite.embed.title: Invite
en.invite.slash.name: invite
en.invite.slash.description: Invite STW Daily to your server, or join the support server
en.invite.meta.description: This command will provide you with links to invite STW Daily to your server, or join the support server.
en.info.processing.title: Crunching the numbers
en.info.embed.title: Information
en.info.slash.name: info
en.info.slash.description: View information about STW Daily! Also verify authenticity of the bot.
en.info.meta.brief: View information about STW Daily's host, the bot, and the bot's developer. Also verify authenticity.
en.info.meta.description: This command will return various bits of information about the bot, which you may find interesting as a developer. It will also verify the authenticity of the bot.

en.how2.embed.description3: Go to {0} and copy your auth code.
en.how2.embed.description5: There are two ways to claim your daily:

en.how2.meta.brief: Command used to send the how to use embed for STW Dailies

en.homebase.embed.title: Homebase Name
en.homebase.embed.field1.name: {0} Changed Homebase name from:
en.homebase.embed.field2.name: {0} To:
en.homebase.slash.name: homebase
en.homebase.slash.description: This command allows you to view / change the name of your Homebase in STW (authentication required)
en.homebase.meta.args.name: name
en.homebase.meta.args.name.description: The new name for your Homebase. Leave blank to view your current name + banner
en.homebase.meta.brief: View / change the name of your Homebase in STW (authentication required)
en.homebase.meta.description.main: This command allows you to view / change the name of your Homebase in STW. You must be authenticated to use this command.
en.homebase.meta.description.list: **Please note there are limitations on what your Homebase name can be:**
en.homebase.meta.description.list.item2: It may only contain alphanumerics (0-9, a-z) + additional characters ('-._~) + spaces
en.homebase.meta.description.list.item3: When entering a name with spaces while not using slash commands, please put "quote marks" around the new name
en.homebase.meta.description.list.item4: Support for other languages will be available in the future
en.homebase.meta.description.list.item5: STW isn't required but what's the point?
en.homebase.meta.description.list.item6: Please note that this command is still experimental {0}
en.help.embed.title: Help
en.help.embed.description: **To use a command: Ping the bot, type the command + options after; Example:** {0}
en.help.view.select.main_menu.description: Return to viewing all available commands
en.help.meta.args.command.description: The name of a command to display detailed information on
en.help.slash.name: help
en.help.slash.description: An interactive view of all available commands
en.help.meta.description: This command provides an interactive interface to view all available commands, and help for how to use each command. The select menu is only available to the author of the command, and will display more detailed information of the selected command. If no command is selected, brief info about all available command will be displayed.

en.bbdump.meta.description: This command would dump your Battle Breakers profiles as a JSON attachment for archival purposes.

en.auth.slash.name: auth
en.auth.slash.description: Login with your Epic Games authcode and start an authentication session
en.auth.meta.description.main: This command allows you to authenticate your Epic Games account to use commands that require it. This command will send you a code to your Epic Games account, which you will need to enter in the bot DMs. If you have 2FA enabled on your Epic Games account, you will need to enter the code in the bot DMs.
en.auth.slash.token: Your Epic Games authcode. Leave this blank to get one
en.auth.embed.currentauth.title: Currently Authenticated
en.auth.kill.slash.name: kill
en.auth.kill.meta.description1: This command will end your active authentication session and delete any temporarily stored data.
en.auth.kill.meta.description2: Use this command after switching profiles to logout of the old profile.
en.auth.kill.embed.title: Killed Auth Session
en.auth.kill.missing.embed.title: Kill Auth Session
en.auth.kill.missing.embed.description: You have no sessions to kill
en.generic.slash.token: Your Epic Games authcode. Required unless you have an active session.
en.generic.slash.optout: Opt out of starting an authentication session
en.generic.meta.args.optout.description: Any text given will opt you out of starting an authentication session
en.generic.embed.timeout: *Timed out. Please rerun the command to continue.*
en.generic.help.experimental: Please note that this command is still experimental {0}
